Reason: The configuration 'batch_size_warn_threshold_in_kb' is considered performance-sensitive. This is because the configuration directly impacts system performance by setting a threshold for logging a WARN message when a multiple-partition batch size exceeds the specified value. Additionally, increasing the value of 'batch_size_warn_threshold_in_kb' can lead to node instability as larger batch sizes may strain the system, highlighting the significant impact this configuration can have on system performance.
